ParameterList.SPARQLQuery:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX db: <file:///resource/> PREFIX sb: <http://localhost:2020/sb/resource/> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX map: <file:///home/daniele/D2RQ/d2r-server-0.7/peld_plankton.n3#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
Select distinct ?name ?name_syn ?name_pred ?dt ?reg { ?s rdf:type sb:catfish. ?r rdf:type sb:region. ?s sb:catfish_collect_local ?r. ?s sb:catfish_collect_date ?dt. ?r sb:region_name_reg ?reg. ?tx rdf:type sb:taxon. ?s sb:catfish_id_taxon ?tx. ?tx sb:taxon_popular_name ?name. ?tc rdf:type sb:trophic_chain.
OPTIONAL {?syn sb:taxon_id_synon_taxon ?tx; sb:taxon_popular_name ?name_syn}. OPTIONAL {?tc sb:trophic_chain_id_predator_taxon ?pred; sb:trophic_chain_id_prey_taxon ?tx . ?pred sb:taxon_popular_name ?name_pred}.
Filter regex (?reg, ?:reg). Filter (?dt = ?:dt ).
} order by ?name

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX db: <file:///resource/> PREFIX sco: <http://localhost:2020/sco/resource/> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX map: <file:///home/daniele/D2RQ/d2r-server-0.7/peld_catfish.n3#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
Select distinct ?name ?name_syn ?name_pred ?dt ?reg { ?s rdf:type sco:fish. ?r rdf:type sco:region. ?s sco:fish_collect_local ?r. ?s sco:fish_collect_date ?dt. ?r sco:region_name_reg ?reg. ?pa rdf:type sco:fish_analysis. ?pa sco:fish_analysis_id_collect ?s. ?tx rdf:type sco:taxon. ?pa sco:fish_analysis_id_taxon ?tx. ?tx sco:taxon_popular_name ?name. ?tc rdf:type sco:trophic_chain. OPTIONAL {?syn sco:taxon_id_synon_taxon ?tx; sco:taxon_popular_name ?name_syn}. OPTIONAL {?tc sco:trophic_chain_id_predator_taxon ?pred; sco:trophic_chain_id_prey_taxon ?tx . ?pred sco:taxon_popular_name ?name_pred}.
Filter regex (?reg, ?:reg). Filter (?dt = ?:dt ).
} order by ?name

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX db: <file:///resource/> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX map: <file:///home/daniele/D2RQ/d2r-server-0.7/peld_fish.n3#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX spl: <http://localhost:2020/spl/resource/>
Select distinct ?name ?name_syn ?name_pred ?dt ?reg { ?s rdf:type spl:plankton. ?r rdf:type spl:region. ?s spl:plankton_collect_local ?r. ?s spl:plankton_collect_date ?dt. ?r spl:region_name_reg ?reg. ?pa rdf:type spl:plankton_analysis. ?pa spl:plankton_analysis_id_collect ?s. ?tx rdf:type spl:taxon. ?pa spl:plankton_analysis_id_taxon ?tx. ?tx spl:taxon_popular_name ?name. ?tc rdf:type spl:trophic_chain.
OPTIONAL {?tc spl:trophic_chain_id_predator_taxon ?pred; spl:trophic_chain_id_prey_taxon ?tx . ?pred spl:taxon_popular_name ?name_pred}. OPTIONAL {?syn spl:taxon_id_synon_taxon ?tx; spl:taxon_popular_name ?name_syn}.
Filter regex (?reg, ?:reg). Filter (?dt = ?:dt ).
} order by ?name
